author: tcuisset
body:
#### PR description:
Fix the pdgId of the simTrackstersSC collection.

In the case where a SimTrackster (from SimCluster) was built from a CaloParticle that crossed boundary, the pdgId was taken from the SimCluster collection instead of the CaloParticle collection, leading to a wrong pdgId assignment.

This PR fixes the issue by taking the pdgId from the relevant collection for each SimTrackster.


No changes are expected in validation. Only the `pdgId` branch of the `simtrackstersSC` collection of the TICLDumper should change. 

#### PR validation:

Tested on worfklows : 
 - 29634.207,29693.207,29834.207 (TICLv5 with TICLDumper)
 - 29634.206,29693.206,29834.206 (TICLv4 with TICLDumper)



#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

@felicepantaleo
title: Fix SimTracksterSC pdgId in TICLDumper
